name: Deadly Simplicity
prerequisite: deity with a simple or unarmed attack favored weapon, trained with your deity's favored weapon
summary: When you are wielding your deity’s favored weapon, increase the damage die size of that weapon by one step.

name: Divine Castigation
summary: Your deity’s grace doesn’t extend to your sworn enemies.

name: Domain Initiate
summary: Your deity bestows a special spell related to their powers.

name: False Faith
summary: Droskar knows you may need to disguise yourself in societies that oppose your faith.

name: Harming Hands
summary: The mordant power of your void energy grows.

name: Healing Hands
summary: Your vitality is even more vibrant and restorative.

name: Premonition of Avoidance
summary: Your deity grants you a moment’s foresight.

name: Reach Spell
summary: You can extend your spells’ range.

name: Splinter Faith
summary: Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical

name: Syncretism
summary: You have come to see the overlap between two deities’ teachings

name: Vile Desecration
summary: You combine unholy might with negative energy to damage angels, archons, and other self-righteous denizens of the Outer Planes.

name: Cantrip Expansion
summary: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Communal Healing
summary: You’re an exceptional conduit for vitality and, as you channel it through you, you can divert some to heal yourself or another creature.

name: Emblazon Armament
summary: Carefully etching a sacred image into a physical object, you steel yourself for battle.

name: Panic the Dead
summary: Vitality strikes terror in the undead.

name: Rapid Response
summary: You work quickly in emergencies.

name: Resilient Mind
summary: You're firm in your convictions and have girded your mind against outside influence.

name: Sap Life
summary: You draw the life force out of your enemies.

name: Versatile Font
prerequisite: harmful font or healing font; deity that allows clerics to have both fonts
summary: As you explore your deity’s aspects, you move beyond restrictions on healing or harming.

name: Warpriest’s Armor
summary: Your training has helped you adapt to ever-heavier armor.

name: Channel Smite
summary: You siphon the energies of life and death through a melee attack and into your foe.

name: Command Undead
summary: You grasp the animating force within an undead creature and bend it to your will.

name: Directed Channel
summary: You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction.

name: Divine Infusion
summary: You pour energy into the subject of your healing to empower its attacks.

name: Improved Communal Healing
summary: You can direct excess channeled energy outward to benefit an ally.

name: Irezoko Tattoo
prerequisite: Expert in Arcana or Expert in Occultism
summary: Your face bears an intricate magical tattoo known as the _irezoko_, a badge of your understanding of your chosen field of magic and a recognition of your advancement within Absalom's College of Mysteries.

name: Necrotic Infusion
summary: You pour negative energy into your undead subject to empower its attacks.

name: Prayer-Touched Weapon
prerequisite: divine spells, you follow a good-aligned deity
summary: You coat a weapon you're wielding in prayers and the divine power given to you by your deity.

name: Radiant Infusion
summary: You pour invigorating positive energy into a living ally.

name: Raise Symbol
summary: You present your religious symbol emphatically.

name: Restorative Strike
summary: You balance both sides of the scales, restoring yourself while striking a foe.

name: Sacred Ground
summary: You pray continuously for 1 minute to call a subtle shadow of your deity’s realm over a 30-foot burst centered on you.

name: Undying Conviction
prerequisite: able to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: Your presence has a bolstering effect on your undead minions.

name: Cast Down
summary: The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down.

name: Detonating Spell
summary: Your spell becomes volatile and explosive.

name: Divine Rebuttal
summary: You strive against magical threats physically and spiritually.

name: Divine Weapon
summary: You siphon residual spell energy into a weapon you’re wielding.

name: Magic Hands
summary: The blessing of your deity heightens your healing ability, integrating magical healing with the mundane.

name: Selective Energy
summary: As you call down divine power, you can prevent some enemies from benefiting or some allies from being hurt.

name: Steady Spellcasting
summary: You don’t lose spells easily. If a reaction would disrupt your spellcasting action, attempt a DC 15 flat check. If you succeed, your action isn’t disrupted.

name: Advanced Domain
summary: Your prayers have unlocked deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

name: Cremate Undead
summary: Your overwhelming vitality sets undead alight.

name: Emblazon Energy
summary: With elemental forces, you make your emblazoned symbols more potent.

name: Expanded Domain Initiate
summary: You have long venerated one of your deity’s lesser-known aspects

name: Martyr
summary: You go to extreme lengths to support your allies, even when it means bringing harm to yourself.

name: Restorative Channel
summary: You can remove conditions with divine grace.

name: Sanctify Armament
summary: You touch a weapon and bring it into concordance with your deity.

name: Surging Focus
summary: When an ally you can see falls in battle, your surge of righteous indignation allows you to draw upon untapped reserves of divine power.

name: Void Siphon
summary: The raw energy of the Void saps the essence of the living.

name: Zealous Rush
summary: You bless yourself on the move.

name: Castigating Weapon
summary: The force of your deity’s castigation strengthens your body so you can strike down the enemy and its allies.

name: Consecrate Spell
prerequisite: ability to cast focus spells, divine spells
summary: You infuse a spell with the power of your faith, consecrating it.

name: Heroic Recovery
summary: The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient.

name: Holy Light
summary: You raise your arms to the sky and pray fervently, surrounding yourself in a beacon of holy light.

name: Improved Command Undead
prerequisite: harmful font; Command Undead; evil alignment
summary: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands.

name: Replenishment of War
prerequisite: expert in your deity’s favored weapon
summary: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity.

name: Shared Avoidance
summary: You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

name: Shield of Faith
summary: Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses.

name: Through Spell
summary: Spells you cast can transform briefly into vital essence, traveling harmlessly through living and undead creatures between you and your target, blocked only by solid objects.

name: Defensive Recovery
summary: Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing.

name: Domain Focus
summary: Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you.

name: Emblazon Antimagic
summary: Your deity’s symbol protects against offensive magic.

name: Fortunate Relief
summary: Your god favors your attempts to remove afflictions and conditions.

name: Miraculous Intervention
summary: Through divine intervention or whispered prayers, you foil an enemy's response.

name: Necromancer's Visage
prerequisite: ability to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: Necromantic energy demonstrates your power over undead, creating a demeanor that commands their fear and respect.

name: Sapping Symbol
summary: Your religious symbol glows with sacred energy, turning the attacker’s strength to weakness.

name: Shared Replenishment
summary: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

name: Channeling Block
summary: You pour divine energy into a desperate block.

name: Deity's Protection
summary: When you call upon your deity’s power to fulfill the promise of their domain, you gain divine protection.

name: Ebb and Flow
summary: You can pull forth both vitality and the void simultaneously to harm your enemies and heal your allies.

name: Fast Channel
summary: Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call.

name: Lasting Armament
summary: When you sanctify a weapon, it remains sanctified for an extended period.

name: Premonition of Clarity
summary: Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks.

name: Purifying Breeze
summary: You transfer the divine essence of your magic to the air around you, cleansing it of toxins.

name: Sepulchral Sublimation
prerequisite: ability to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard
summary: You repurpose the negative energy that flows through your minions at a moment's notice.

name: Swift Banishment
summary: The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane.

name: Eternal Bane
summary: Your life has made you a nexus for your deity’s vile power.

name: Eternal Blessing
summary: Your deeds have brought your deity’s grace to you for all of eternity.

name: Rebounding Smite
summary: The energy from your smite persists for a moment, allowing you to pass it to a new target.

name: Remediate
summary: If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action heal or harm spell, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

name: Resurrectionist
summary: You can cause a creature you bring back from the brink of death to thrive and continue healing.

name: Divine Apex
summary: You can pour divine power into an item, letting the wearer exceed their limits.

name: Domain Wellspring
summary: The intensity of your focus grows from the investment you’ve placed in your domains.

name: Echoing Channel
summary: When you pull forth vitality or void energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy.

name: Improved Swift Banishment
summary: You easily banish creatures with your weapon.

name: Inviolable
summary: Your deity punishes creatures that harm you.

name: Miraculous Possibility
summary: Your deity empowers you to perform minor miracles, allowing you to readily adapt to the fluctuating needs of your duties.

name: Shared Clarity
summary: You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

name: Avatar's Audience
summary: Your extensive service affords you certain divine privileges.

name: Avatar's Protection
summary: In moments of danger, you can call upon your god’s form in an instant.

name: Dance of Intercession
summary: You either performed in or stood witness to the dance used to invoke the Celestial Dragon and can harness a sliver of their power.

name: Denier of Destruction
summary: You can manipulate the same energies that the _aeon orbs_ use to sustain life.

name: Emblazon Divinity
summary: Emblazon more equipment at the same time.

name: Maker of Miracles
summary: You are a conduit for truly deific power.

name: Spellshape Channel
summary: Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the energy of life and death.
